text: It was my first time feeling relaxed during a waxing session! From the booking, to the actual session and the follow-up, Maddy has been professional throughout. She's also very friendly and I had a wonderful experience. Would definitely come back again! 😊

I had an amazing waxing experience! The session was handled with such care and skill that it was completely painless and incredibly relaxing. I felt so comfortable throughout, with no awkwardness at all. The service was professional and reassuring, making it easy for me to overcome my fear of waxing. I’m so happy with the results and will definitely be coming back for my waxing routines. Highly recommend!

Maddy’s ability to make one feel comfortable and at ease during the waxing session is a testament to her professionalism and skill. It’s my first time w Maddy, and even though I am heavily pregnant and sensitive, Maddy handled me with such care and the session was mostly painless. Thank you for taking care of me! I’ll definitely be back again!! 😁😁

I would like to commend Maddy for her professionalism, attitude, and knowledge of her work. I did Brazilian waxing and it wasn’t painful at all. She is also very friendly and I can’t think of any pain at all. Now I am sure that I will always go back here. Definitely more than a 5 star ⭐
Did Brazilian with Maddy. She was very friendly and good with her skills. I am very happy with the results. Hands down will definitely come back again ! Thank you Maddy :)
